title: Journal of Traditional Medicine and Chinese Medicine
cleaned_text: Journal of Traditional Medicine and Chinese Medicine is an open access peer-reviewed journal from the publishers of Scientific Research and Community (SRC) which publishes articles in the form of written, video and power-point presentations from the arena of Traditional Medicine and Chinese Medicine. The journal focuses to build up accessing the complete content of articles freely from online for reader's perusal. Article acceptance will be in the form of Research, Review, Case Reports, Analysis, Magazines, Editorials, Opinion, Communications, Mini-Review, Short Communications, Picturized, Book Review, Video Type and Power Point Presentations (PPTS). Accepts articles in all the formats from: Hyperuricemia, Network pharmacology, Molecular docking, Diabetic retinopathy, Gut microbiota, mucosal inflammation, Bone marrow stromal cells, Sperm morphology, Homeopathic Medicine, Plant extracts, Medicinal tree, Pharmacological effects, Anti-cancer, Herbal Medicines, Fatty acid uptake, Herbal-food supplement, Antidiabetic, Natural antioxidants, Thrombolysis, Antigastropathy, Intestinal transit, Thin layer chromatography, Ayurvedic formulation, Wound healing, Acupuncture, Chinese Herbal Medicine, Alternative Medicine, Traditional Medicine, Ayurveda, Unani, Homeopathy, Traditional Systems of Medicine, etc... You can submit articles online
